amendment.description: Amendment changed section 104, regarding the SBIR Advisory Board, to the extent that it would add small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans to the groups to be targeted by the board to make applications for SBIR grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 110-603 to change section 104, regarding the SBIR Advisory Board. It would add to small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans to the groups to be targeted by the board to make applications for SBIR grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 405 - 0 (Roll no. 214).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mrs. Capito.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 405 - 0 (Roll no. 214).
